trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged> event occurs when the user changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> that is selected in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged>使用者變更時，就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>中已選取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> named `PropertyGrid1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>名為`PropertyGrid1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The previously selected grid item.
trans-unit.target: 之前選取的格線項目。

trans-unit.source: The newly selected grid item.
trans-unit.target: 新選取的格線項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectedGridItemChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectedGridItemChangedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the newly selected <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得新選取的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> named `PropertyGrid1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the previously selected <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得之前選取的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The old <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 舊的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />。

trans-unit.source: This can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。
